amendment.description: To prohibit the Export-Import Bank of the United States from providing financing to a person or for a project in a country the government or central bank of which holds debt instruments of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2101, under the order of 5/14/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 89. Record Vote Number: 92.

action.text: Amendment SA 2101 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S3155-3156; text: CR S3156) To prohibit the Export-Import Bank of the United States from providing financing to a person or for a project in a country the government or central bank of which holds debt instruments of the United States.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2101, under the order of 5/14/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 89. Record Vote Number: 92.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2101 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2101, under the order of 5/14/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 89. Record Vote Number: 92.
